attributes.action: STOP LYING AND DECIEVING THE PEOPLE OF BRITAIN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown has proved to lie to and deceive the public over Iraq and other matters such as the referendum on the European constitution. I am asking Gordon Brown to be honest with the country and stop deceiving us as he is not fooling anyone.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Statements that don't actually request any action
